name: Project Bore
description:
Project bore is a Psychological-Horror RPG is about the story of a man trying to fight himself and his inner demons. Project Bore takes you through seven handcrafted levels with their own tailor-made songs. Project Bore was made as a sort of experiment on how a new approach on the traditional turn-based could lead to a different yet exciting experience.

Warning: The game could contain sensitive themes

Creators: 

Bilar Mokhtari and Zakaria Berrada.

Tailor-Made Songs were created by talented indie musicians Wicked Harmony, Tohomoko, and Zakaria.

Make sure to join us on discord for more updates and events!

Project Bore may look like your average RPG-Maker game but I promise you there's more under that iceberg sweetheart wink.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move

Z to interact

X to talk in dialogue

and mouse for battle.

Penitence - Smite your opponent with the strength of a thousand thunderstorms but hurt JJ too.

The Original Sin: heal 200 hp (can only be used 5 times)

Blasphemy - Exchange one of the bosses attacks with yours (Random)

Repentance - JJ Loses 20% of his health and Increases his damage by 50% (done)
